text: Welcome to the intro to machine learning. In this lecture we will discuss supervised learning, regression, and classification. Regression predicts continuous values. Classification predicts discrete labels.
title: sample_lecture.srt

text: Regression predicts continuous values. Classification predicts discrete labels. We will cover loss functions, gradient descent, and evaluation metrics like accuracy and MRR.
title: sample_lecture.srt
